mediaDisplay.text: 1. Press "Menu" on the remote to display the main menu. 2. Use the arrow keys on the remote to highlight "Music" in the menu and press "OK" on the remote to display the Music screen. The Music screen displays all the music available on the media player, with albums listed first. 3. Use the arrow keys to browse through your music lists and select music. - OR - 4. Press "Menu" again to display the Music menu, select "Search", and press "OK" on the remote to open the Search Music screen and look for specific music. 5. When you’ve selected the music you want to play, press the Play button on the remote. 6. Press "Menu" again while the music is playing to display the menu options for this screen. * Play Once: Play all music once. * Repeat Track: Repeat the current track until you choose a different option. * Repeat All: Repeat all the music in the order it’s listed. * Shuffle & Repeat: Play the music continuously in random order. 7. Press "Info" on the remote to display the album title, artist name, running time, year, and progress bar. 8. Press the "Volume" + and - keys on the remote to adjust the sound.
